Key.French: Actualiser le contenu de la boîte.

Key.Original: Search over, you haven't found anything.
Key.English: Search over, you haven't found anything.
Key.French: Recherche terminée, vous n'avez rien trouvé.
Vous êtes en train de fouiller l'objet.

Key.Original: This action requires a hacking tool
Key.English: This action requires a hacking tool
Key.French: Cette action necessite un outil de piratage

Key.Original: Add a conversation to this unit
Key.English: Add a conversation to this unit

Key.Original: This will add an ACE3 'talk' interaction to the unit. If a player talks to the unit. You can optionally run some code when interaction is used. Enabling 'Global Exec' remote execute the code on all machines. The code receives the parameters in select 1, while select 0 is the unit eg: _unit = _this select 0;_passedParameters = (_this select 1);
Key.English: This will add an ACE3 'talk' interaction to the unit. If a player talks to the unit. You can optionally run some code when interaction is used. Enabling 'Global Exec' remote execute the code on all machines. The code receives the parameters in select 1, while select 0 is the unit eg: _unit = _this select 0;_passedParameters = (_this select 1);

Key.Original: Code to run when the message is said. Code receives parameters as _unit = _this select 0; _passedParameters = _this select 1;(see below)
Key.English: Code to run when the message is said. Code receives parameters as _unit = _this select 0; _passedParameters = _this select 1;(see below)
Key.French: Code à executer quand le message est donné. Le code reçoit les paramètres suivants _unite = _this select 0;_parametresPasses = _this select 1;(voir ci-dessous)

Key.Original: Params sent to the code. To get them in the code you can do: (_this select 1) params ["_param1","_param2","_paramN"];
Key.English: Params sent to the code. To get them in the code you can do: (_this select 1) params ["_param1","_param2","_paramN"];
Key.French: Paramètres passés au code. Pour les récupérer dans le code vous pouvez faire: (_this select 1) params ["_param1","_param2","_paramN"];

Key.Original: If enabled the code will be executed on all machines.
Key.English: If enabled the code will be executed on all machines.
Key.French: Si activé, le code sera executé sur toutes les machines.

Key.Original: If enabled the talk action will be removed on all machines after any player has accessed the conversation.
Key.English: If enabled the talk action will be removed on all machines after any player has accessed the conversation.
Key.French: Si ce réglage est activé l'action parler sera enlevée sur toutes les machines après que n'importe quel joueur ait accédé à la conversation.

Key.Original: Enabling only this setting will result in a 'You haven't found anything' message.
Key.English: Enabling only this setting will result in a 'You haven't found anything' message.
Key.French: Si ce réglage seulement est activé, la recherche entraînera un message 'Vous n'avez rien trouvé.

Key.Original: If you enable this setting you have to provide a name for the object that is found (see below)
Key.English: If you enable this setting you have to provide a name for the object that is found (see below)
Key.French: Si vous activez ce réglage il faut fournir un nom pour ce qui est trouvé (voir ci-dessous)

Key.Original: This you be displayed in a hint 'you have found...'
Key.English: This you be displayed in a hint 'you have found...'
Key.French: Sera affiché dans un hint de type 'Vous avez trouvé...'

Key.Original: Code to run when object is found:
Key.English: Code to run when object is found:
Key.French: Code à executer quand l'objet est trouvé.

Key.Original: Upon finding the object a code will run (local to the player that found the object),source object is passed as a parameter (_this select 0)
Key.English: Upon finding the object a code will run (local to the player that found the object),source object is passed as a parameter (_this select 0)
Key.French: Quand un objet est trouvé le code sera executé (local au joueur qui a trouvé l'objet), l'objet source est passé comme paramètre (_this select 0)

Key.Original: This will add an ACE3 'search object' interaction. If you just enable the 'object can be searched' setting, the search will result in a 'you haven't found anything' message otherwise you can make the search successful and give a name for the 'you have found...' message. Upon ending a successful search the (optional) code will be executed. The source object is passed to the code and can be retrieved with _this select 0
Key.English: This will add an ACE3 'search object' interaction. If you just enable the 'object can be searched' setting, the search will result in a 'you haven't found anything' message otherwise you can make the search successful and give a name for the 'you have found...' message. Upon ending a successful search the (optional) code will be executed. The source object is passed to the code and can be retrieved with _this select 0
Key.French: Ceci ajoute une interaction ACE3 'fouiller l'objet'. Si vous activez seulement ke réglage 'L'objet peut être fouillé', la recherche renverra un message 'vous n'avez rien trouvé'. Vous pouvez faire que la recherche soit un succès et donner un nom à l'objet trouvé pour le message 'Vous avez trouvé...'. A la fin d'une recherche le code (optionel) sera executé. L'objet source est passé comme paramètre au code (_this select 0)

Key.Original: A small electronic device used to hack electronic devices
Key.English: A small electronic device used to hack electronic devices
Key.French: Appareil électronique utilisé pour effectuer des piratages
